headline: Fluence Energy, ChargePoint, Perma-Fix, Tutor Perini, and Bel Fuse Stocks Trade Down, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after investors took some profits off the table as markets awaited signals on future monetary policy from the Federal Reserve's Jackson Hole symposium later in the week.

headline: IYZ: Concentrated Telco ETF, Hard To See The Upside
summary: IYZ underperforms both its peer XTL and the S&P 500, with disappointing returns and unattractive projected industry growth. Read more on why I do not recommend IYZ.

headline: AT&T (T) Appoints Kelly Grier To Board As Scott Ford Announces Retirement
summary: On August 15, 2025, AT&T (T) announced the election of Kelly J. Grier to its Board of Directors, marking a significant transition in its leadership team. Interestingly, this leadership transformation coincided with a recent 7% increase in the company’s share price over the past month. The broader market context showed mixed trends, with the Dow touching an all-time high but declines in tech-heavy indexes like the Nasdaq. Additionally, AT&T's positive earnings report, revealing increased...
